properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
STRAIT OF SICILY.
PANTELLERIA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
TWO VESSELS, WHITE AND RED HULLS, REQUESTING
ASSISTANCE:
A. EIGHT PERSONS ON BOARD, IN
   36-19.00N 011-43.00E AT 291224Z OCT.
B. 16 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN 36-07.00N 012-21.00E
   AT 291303Z OCT.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
MRCC ROME, INMARSAT: 424744220,
PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
